effect.black_white: This Pokémon cannot be poisoned. This includes bad poison. If a Pokémon is poisoned and acquires this ability, its poison is healed; this includes when regaining a lost ability upon leaving battle.
effect.black_2_white_2: This Pokémon cannot be poisoned. This includes bad poison. If a Pokémon is poisoned and acquires this ability, its poison is healed; this includes when regaining a lost ability upon leaving battle.

flavor_text.black_white: Prevents the Pokémon from getting poisoned.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: Prevents the Pokémon from getting poisoned.
